title: Derry duck and Londonderry potatoes
description: Duck breasts in an orange glaze with sautéed potatoes and caramelised apples - plus a side of kale to cut through the richness.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a Parisian scoop (also known as a melon baller).
ingredients: 1 large squash, peeled and cut into 2cm/¾in dice
1 tbsp lemon juice, for acidulated water
4 duck breasts, trimmed, butterflied and skin scored
50g/1¾oz duck fat (reserved from cooking the duck breast)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
